resources.string: This feature will be available in near future. Thankyou for using Xpendings

Xpendings is an app that avails you to manage your income and expenses. Xpendings is the most facile & most convenient way to keep track of your incomes and expenses. You can integrate variants of categories with an astounding accumulation of colors and images. App provides the following features: » You can integrate wallet by integrating name and amplitude of wallet. » This app sanctions you to make transactions utilizing the wallet. » Your wallet will be managed on the substructure of your income and expenses. » You can filter transactions (All time and Daily). » You can manage transactions by editing them. » This app sanctions you to visually perceive all the transactions visually and you can apportion it as well. Xpendings is Developed by Gexton INC.
